name: CatholicPrayers(ASMREdition)
0:
”Alexa, open catholic prayers a. s. m. r.”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers a. s. m. r. for our father”
”Alexa, ask catholic prayers a. s. m. r. to pick a prayer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: catholic prayers a. s. m. r.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sit back and relax. Have your Alexa say a prayer for you with the Catholic Prayers (ASMR Edition) skill. Just ask it to say a prayer from the list below or you can ask it to pick one for you by saying "pick a prayer."

Visual graphics of images and prayers on screen for Echo Show, Echo Spot, and FireTV devices.

Can now move and follow you while interacting with it for the new Echo Show 10 (3rd Generation).

LIKE Catholic Prayers on Facebook for tutorials and updates:
https://www.facebook.com/catholicprayersalexa

List of Prayers: 

The Sign of the Cross
Hail Mary 
Our Father/The Lord's Prayer 
Glory Be 
The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy 
The Apostle's Creed 
Hail Holy Queen 
Anima Christi 
Memorare 
The Angelus 
Saint Michael Prayer 
Act of Contrition 
Miraculous Medal Prayer 
Morning Offering 
Guardian Angel Prayer 
Grace Before Meals 
Grace After Meals 
The Nicene Creed 
Pray to Saint Joseph 
Serenity Prayer 
Act of Faith 
Act of Love 
Act of Hope 
The Fatima Prayer
Hail Mary of Gold
Pardon Prayer
Angel's Prayer
The Miracle Prayer to St. Anthony of Padua
The Magnificat
Hail, Joseph
Pope Benedict XVI's Prayer for Vocation
Prayer of St. Francis of Assisi
Litany of Mary
Prayer to St. Christopher
Prayer of St. Dominic
Prayer of St. Thomas Aquinas
Prayer of St. Benedict

Prayers Pack One:

Acceptance of God's Will
Act of Dedication to the Blessed Virgin
Christ
Prayer After Confession
Prayer After Meditation

Prayers Pack Two:

Three O'Clock Prayer to the Divine Mercy
Evening Prayer
Night Prayer
Prayer of Surrender
Prayer for Saint Joseph's Intercession

Latin Prayers Pack One:

Signum Crucis (The Sign of the Cross in Latin)
Oratio Dominica (Our Father / The Lord's Prayer in Latin)
Ave Maria (Hail Mary in Latin)
Doxologia Minor (Glory Be in Latin)
Oratio Fatimae (The Fatima Prayer in Latin)

Latin Prayers Pack Two:

Symboloum Apostolorum (The Apostle's Creed in Latin)
Salve Regina (Hail Holy Queen in Latin)
Gratia Ante Cibum (Grace Before Meals in Latin)
Gratia Post Cibum (Grace After Meals in Latin)
Symbolum Nicaenum (The Nicene Creed in Latin)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
